**Application**: Genetic map construction          
**Created**: 05-2016                      
**By**: Dennis van Muijen en David Nieuwenhuijse                
**Version**: 0.1                   
**Email**: dennis.vanmuijen@gmail.com, davidnieuwenhuijse@gmail.com             
**Platform**: R Shiny               

**Usage**:
This tool is a web-browser based shiny application for interactive genetic map construction. Functions of the packages ASMap and qtl are used for map construction and quality control. Visualisations are made with ggplot and ggiraph. Currently only the analysis of the F6 RIL population used for the course PBR_32803 (Distance Learning) is supported.
